Class ClaimInfoActivity

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback

    public class ClaimInfoActivity
extends TravelTrackerActivity
    Activity for managing an individual Claim. Possible as a Claimant or an Approver.
    Author:
    kdbanman, therabidsquirel, colp skwidz

                User approver)
        attach listeners to buttons/textviews/etc. hide buttons/views according to user role
        Parameters:
        items - Collection of a claims expense items
        claimant - User that created the claim
        approver - user that approved the claim (if exsists)

      • populateClaimInfo

        public void populateClaimInfo(Claim claim,
                     java.util.Collection<Item> items,
                     User claimant,
                     User approver)
        Populate the fields with data.
        Parameters:
        claim - The claim being viewed.
        items - All items (which will be filtered by claim UUID).
        claimant - The claimant, or null if the current user is the claimant.
        approver - The last approver, or null if there isn't one.
